text: Baildon Katowice was an ice hockey team from Katowice, Poland. They competed in the Polska Hokej Liga, the top level of ice hockey in Poland, until folding in 1982. ==External links== * Profile on World Hockey Category:1920 establishments in Poland Category:1982 disestablishments in Poland Category:Ice hockey teams in Poland Category:Sport in Katowice
title: Baildon Katowice
